2025-11-09T16:04:00.CONTENT_EN: All car parks at West Kowloon Cultural District are full. Members of the public are encouraged to take public transport to the West Kowloon Cultural District.
2025-11-09T16:04:00.CONTENT_CN: 西九文化區內所有停車場現已泊滿車輛，前往西九文化區一帶的市民請使用公共交通工具。

2025-11-10T13:25:00.CONTENT_EN: As informed by the Chinese Mainland Railway Authorities, the following High Speed Rail train trips have been cancelled due to adverse weather conditions: From Hong Kong West Kowloon Station to Shenzhenbei Station: G5612 From Hong Kong West Kowloon Station to Xiamen Station: G3006, G3008 From Hong Kong West Kowloon Station to Shantou Station: G6574, G6578 From Shenzhenbei Station to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station: G5609, G5613 From Xiamen Station to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station: G3005, G3007 From Shantou Station to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station: G6573, G6577 For latest train schedules, please refer to 12306 official website (12306. cn) on the mobile app. Passengers may also check latest train information from the HSR website, mobile app or the information available at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. For ticket refunds, please refer to the High Speed Rail website and process within the time stated. Please use the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app and there is no need to rush to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station.
2025-11-10T13:25:00.CONTENT_CN: 中國內地鐵路單位通報，由於天氣情況惡劣，下列高速鐵路列車車次取消： 由香港西九龍站前往深圳北站：G5612 由香港西九龍站前往廈門站：G3006,G3008 由香港西九龍站前往汕頭站：G6574,G6578 由深圳北站前往香港西九龍站：G5609,G5613 由廈門站前往香港西九龍站：G3005,G3007 由汕頭站前往香港西九龍站：G6573,G6577 有關車次的資料，請留意12306官方網站(12306.cn)，如已安裝手機應用程式，可按「車站大屏」頁面。乘客亦可留意於高速鐵路網頁、手機應用程式或香港西九龍站發放的最新資訊。 如需退票，請參閱高速鐵路網頁並於指定日期內辦理。請盡量使用12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式，不用急於到香港西九龍站辦理。

As informed by the Chinese Mainland Railway Authorities, the following High Speed Rail train trips have been cancelled due to adverse weather conditions:

From Hong Kong West Kowloon Station to Shenzhenbei Station: G5612
From Hong Kong West Kowloon Station to Xiamen Station: G3006, G3008
From Hong Kong West Kowloon Station to Shantou Station: G6574, G6578

From Guangzhounan Station to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station: G6527, G6529, G6533, G6535, G6537

For latest train schedules, please refer to 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app. Passengers may also check latest train information from the HSR website, mobile app or the information available at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. 

For ticket refunds, please refer to the High Speed Rail website and process within the time stated. Please use the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app and there is no need to rush to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station.

2025-11-11T09:50:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following special traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR), with details as shown below: The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR is lowered from 100 km/h to 50 km/h.
2025-11-11T09:50:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於強風，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下特別交通及運輸安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路的最高車速限制由每小時100 公里降低至每小時50 公里。

2025-11-11T16:35:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to improved weather condition, the following arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR): The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR resumes to 100 km/h.
2025-11-11T16:35:00.CONTENT_CN: 因天氣情況改善，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路最高車速限制恢復為每小時100 公里。
